name: TokeniserStateTest
description: Unit tests for TokeniserState functionality in Jsoup parser.

test_cases.name: ensureSearchArraysAreSorted
test_cases.description: Ensures that the search arrays in TokeniserState are sorted.

test_cases.name: testCharacterReferenceInRcdata
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of character references in RCDATA.

test_cases.name: testBeforeTagName
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of whitespace before tag names.

test_cases.name: testEndTagOpen
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of end tag open states.

test_cases.name: testRcdataLessthanSign
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of less-than signs in RCDATA.

test_cases.name: testRCDATAEndTagName
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of end tag names in RCDATA.

test_cases.name: testCommentEndCoverage
test_cases.description: Tests the coverage of comment end states.

test_cases.name: testCommentEndBangCoverage
test_cases.description: Tests the coverage of comment end bang states.

test_cases.name: testPublicIdentifiersWithWhitespace
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of public identifiers with whitespace.

test_cases.name: testSystemIdentifiersWithWhitespace
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of system identifiers with whitespace.

test_cases.name: testPublicAndSystemIdentifiersWithWhitespace
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of public and system identifiers with whitespace.

test_cases.name: handlesLessInTagThanAsNewTag
test_cases.description: Tests handling of less-than signs in tags as new tags.

test_cases.name: testUnconsumeAtBufferBoundary
test_cases.description: Tests unconsuming at buffer boundary.

test_cases.name: testUnconsumeAfterBufferUp
test_cases.description: Tests unconsuming after buffer up.

test_cases.name: testOpeningAngleBracketInsteadOfAttribute
test_cases.description: Tests handling of opening angle brackets instead of attributes.

test_cases.name: testMalformedSelfClosingTag
test_cases.description: Tests handling of malformed self-closing tags.

test_cases.name: testOpeningAngleBracketInTagName
test_cases.description: Tests handling of opening angle brackets in tag names.

test_cases.name: rcData
test_cases.description: Tests handling of RCDATA.

test_cases.name: plaintext
test_cases.description: Tests handling of plaintext.

test_cases.name: nullInTag
test_cases.description: Tests handling of null characters in tags.

test_cases.name: attributeValUnquoted
test_cases.description: Tests handling of unquoted attribute values.
